page.title: 10CLUBS
page.content: {CLUBS AND SOCIETIES AVAILABLE IN {GILBERDYKE.} { The villagers of Gilberdyke are able to participate in a surprisingly large range of formal and informal activities, either organised by the villagers themselves or as part of larger national bodies. The following list was compiled after discussion with the children of the school who were able to give the names of the clubs, the venue and day/days upon which the club takes place; knowing that parents, brothers, sisters, grandparents and friends all make use of these facilities.
